income_messages:
From: c*************2@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-03-16 14:13:58
SUBJECT:   Federal Ministry of Finance 
  Federal Ministry of Finance (FMF) 
Ahmadu Bello Way, Central Business District 
Abuja, Nigeria PMB 14, Abuja, Nigeria 
Abuja FCT 00234 Nigeria
16th, March 2023
Attn: 
This is to inform you that we are now processing your transfer payment  as approved for remittance into your account by the Senate Committee on Foreign Debt Settlement  . On this therefore, you are requested to kindly reconfirm your receiving details and current address with your direct mobile number for easy reach .
Right now, all your payment documents need to be re-validated to enable the telex unit to remit to your account and  you are required  to come and sign your payment release order at our CBN telex Credit department in person  to enable final transfer to you as approved . 
If you can not make it down here in person due time constraints, I will get  an attorney appointed to act on your behalf and represent you in all legal requirements and sign all the necessary transfer payment documents , while you pay his legal fee . 
This is all that we need now to complete your payment  release 
      Thank you 
      Mrs, Zainab Ahmed 
      Finance Minister   
From: c*************2@gmail.com
To: vx44279@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-18 02:08:58
SUBJECT: Re: Federal Ministry of Finance
Federal Ministry of Finance (FMF)
Ahmadu Bello Way, Central Business District
Abuja, Nigeria PMB 14, Abuja, Nigeria
Abuja FCT 00234 Nigeria
16th of March 2023
Attn: Bernadine
I have received your email , could you please forward your receiving
account details  and telephone number for processing of your payment by
Monday and since you can not fly down here to do the legalization and
validation of your payment back up documents, I will get you a lawyer by
Monday and he is going to stand for you and do the necessary validation and
legalization so we can pay you .
Please note that you will have to take care of the legal fee of the lawyer
which is around $870, and this fee can not be deducted from your approved
amount of $15.5M is a bonded fund under the  NNPC Contract / Inheritance
payment and is very much ready to be released to you , kindly get back to
me with your details  so I can discuss with the lawyer to represent you on
the way forward to finalize your payment release .
       Thank you
      Mrs, Zainab Ahmed
      Finance Minister

Okay, this payment is valid between now and the 25th of this month . So you
must act fast and follow the given instructions to receive your payment
before the closing date .
Thank you
